Constructor Detail

Entity

public Entity(Vertex location,
              Sprite sprite)
Constructs an Entity and initialises it with the specified location and Sprite.

Parameters:
location - the Vertex to initialise the Entity with based on its location within the Level.
sprite - the Sprite to be assigned to the Entity which represents it visually.

paintOn

public void paintOn(java.awt.Graphics g)

parseFrom

public static Entity parseFrom(java.lang.String input,
                               SpriteSheets spriteSheets)
Creates an Entity from the specified String and SpriteSheets collection and returns it. Parses the Entity from a String in the form: "xPos, yPos, SpriteSheetName, SpriteName" where xPos is the x coordinate of the Entity's location Vertex, yPos is the y coordinate of the Entity's location Vertex, SpriteSheetName is the name of the Sprite's originating SpriteSheet and SpriteName is the name associated with the corresponding Sprite.

Parameters:
input - the data string to be parsed into an Entity.
spriteSheets - the collection of SpriteSheets to initialise the Entity's corresponding Sprite with.
Returns:
the Entity parsed from the specified input parameters.

writeTo

public void writeTo(java.io.PrintWriter out)
             throws java.io.IOException
Writes the Entity's corresponding information to the specified PrintWriter. Outputs to the form: "xPos, yPos, SpriteSheetName, SpriteName" where xPos is the x coordinate of the Entity's location Vertex, yPos is the y coordinate of the Entity's location Vertex, SpriteSheetName is the name of the Sprite's originating SpriteSheet and SpriteName is the name associated with the corresponding Sprite.

Parameters:
out - the PrintWriter to write the Entity's corresponding information onto.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there was an error writing to the output stream.
